document.full_text: the philadelphia 76ers took another step toward returning to the playoffs while damaging houston's post-season ambitions in a 108-97 victory over the rockets on wednesday.
document.title: philadelphia hand rockets crucial loss to inch
lines_and_colors: the philadelphia 76ers took another step toward returning to the playoffs while damaging houston's post-season ambitions in a 108-97 victory over the rockets on wednesday.
